 Please please do not under estimate what can happen with the UN. If for some tragic luck, this gets past the UN and the US abides by UN resolutions, then the 2nd Amendment is effectly NULL and VOID. All done without a vote, Congressial debate, or judicial review. Think of it, forgein countries no real freedom in thier own country, deciding the level of freedom that US citizens will have inside our own borders. A very narrow chance, but a very scary thought.

 the danger IS there, though. If i recall correctly, the Texas Sodomy case in the US Supreme Court had references to European laws in the decision.

 Check this...
 
 Kofi: "Before you step on the rattlesnake..." 
 
 
 "May I suggest Mr. Secretary-General, that if you're not prepared for the unintended consequences of your actions then it would perhaps be better if you did not send the UN down the American gun control road. It would also be wise to remember that a man who is willing to die for his country and liberty is most often also willing to kill for it. Just ask General Gage, another well intentioned gun-grabber, who fortunately for him escaped from this continent with his life after starting a long and costly war. A war, by the way, that we won.
 
 
 
 
 May I also suggest that you step a little lightly when you're around free Americans like us, Mr. Annan. We don't take kindly to strangers trying to tell us which of our liberties meet the approval of the so-called "international community" and which do not. We may one day invite you to leave for your impolite temerity. We've whipped bigger and badder enemies than your globalist rabble before and we can do it again, any time you feel froggy. MV, AL 
 
 
 
 
 P.S. We'll be celebrating July 9 by going to the range and perforating more blue helmets with 5.56mm, 7.62mm, 9mm, 11.4mm & 12.7mm holes. Just to keep our skills up, of course. No threat implied."
